item.title: CVE-2024-6445|2024-09-06T13:33:28.655Z -- dataflowx%20technology -- datadiodex
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in DataFlowX Technology DataDiodeX allows Path Traversal.This issue affects DataDiodeX: before v3.5.0.
